desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"The rules of this match are clear to me. Alright then, go ahead and make your move."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: The Character and Action Cards within Sangonomiya Kokomi's deck are all capable of providing large amounts of Healing. She specializes in protecting her Character Cards before counterattacking.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Tamakushi Casket
customize.desc:
Sangonomiya Kokomi: Tamakushi Casket

Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Tamakushi Casket
customize.desc:

Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I believe that my skills have increased sufficiently over our various matches. How about it? Shall we have another match?"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Sangonomiya Kokomi" starts with the Talent Card "Tamanooya's Casket" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
This character gains <color=#80c0ff>Hydro Application</color> and summons 1 <color=#ffffff>Bake-Kurage</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . Heals all allied characters for 1 point. This character gains <color=#ffffff>Ceremonial Garment</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Ceremonial Garmet</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG.
<color=#ffffff>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heal 1 HP for all your characters.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , heal your active character for 1 HP.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

<color=#80c0ff>Hydro Application</color>
When Hydro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : no effect
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : No effect
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : The target is unable to perform any Action this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : Creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro/Electro DMG
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

value.name: Tamakushi Casket
value.desc:
Sangonomiya Kokomi: Tamakushi Casket

Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.

value.text: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
value.desc: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.
